enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve checking and validating XML-related data.
The method getData() is used to retrieve the data needed for both XML declaration checks and parsing.
The method asXmlDeclaration() returns an XmlDeclaration object, and XmlDeclaration.clone() can be used to create assertions about the returned object.
Both methods involve creating and manipulating XML-related elements, which can inform assertions about the state and content of the XML declaration.
